name: CInsight
description: This is an extension that checks the privacy and cookie information page for the type of information a website collects and tellz the user the implication of each one leveraging Ai. It also have other features such the feature for checking how old a domain name is (to help prevent ... attack), a feature for deleting the cookie in a site upon tag close if the user desires and finally a feature that shows daily internet security tips
author: Israel Nwangwu, Solomon Joboson, Favour Ebube
